My Work

Check out some of my projects... ** Please be patient, as most projects are hosted on Heroku, and takes a few seconds for their servers to start up. See the Github for more detail descriptions for each project **

World Legal Summit

Click for more info Wordpress CSS3

A site built for the World Legal Summit. Check them out and get involved!

Go Shorty

Click for more info Javascript CSS3 NodeJS

This is an URL shortener app, much like the idea of sites such as Bit.ly, Deck.ly, etc. Just a much more simple, uglier version of them :) Comes with working login authorization and password encryption. ** DESKTOP ONLY!! Mobile version in development! **

View Project Live Github

Catch of the Day

Click for more info ReactJS CSS3 NodeJS Firebase

A mock restaurant inventory/menu built with React. Change names/images/quantity orders (will throw a banner on an item saying 'Sold Out' if quantity is 0 or below). ** DESKTOP ONLY!! Mobile version in development! **

View Project Live Github

Movie Database

Click for more info ReactJS CSS3 NodeJS

A movie listing app built in React pulling top movies using the Movie Database's API, along with each movie's poster and synopsis. ** DESKTOP ONLY!! Mobile version in development! **

View Project Live Github

Hookeai Poke

Click for more info Javascript CSS3 NodeJS Postgres

Hungry clients of Hookeai Poke can visit this website, select one or more dishes and place an order for pick-up based around the idea of the app Ritual.

Github

Tweeter

Click for more info Javascript CSS3 NodeJS

A simple, single-page, not as attractive Twitter clone made up to build up and practice my front-end skills with HTML, CSS, JS, jQuery and AJAX, as well as my backend-skills using Node and Express.
